Class TabIdent

  • java.lang.Object
    • TabIdent

  • public class TabIdent
extends java.lang.Object
    SYNCJ Project The purpose of the SYNCJ project is to develop a solution to facilitate the learning of synchronization tools for 4th year programming students from INSA Rennes. In order to do that, we have implemented the synchronization counters mechanism in JAVA.
    Author:
    INSA of Rennes students : Nour Romdhane - Liantsoa Rasata - Mathilde Leparquier - Othmane Kabir - Ibrahim Benali
